name: Pump'king
description:
In pump'king, you will have to make the distinction between who is your ennemy and who is not, but are you really going to make it anyway ?

This game prototype has been made during the Spooktober Jam in 2020 and is still in development. All the assets were made by us :

  • Art and Sound design by Cyclow (My artstation)
  • Coding by Mao

This game jam was the first we've ever done. We unfortunately didn't manage to develop the whole game since we didn't have enough experience to make it happen.
Nevertheless, that was a great moment and we hope we can finish it and take part to another jams in the future.
